markdownRemark.html:
Hello! My name is Eddy Rubio and I am your host. I am a software engineer based out of Mexico City who loves learning new skills. I love all things relating to software engineering. I have experience in front-end development, back-end or server side development and general DevOps tasks.

My favorite programming language is Golang, but I am comfortable working with various tools and frameworks across different languages like Java, C#, SQL, Python, PHP, Javascript, CSS and more.

The main purpose of this blog is to document any thoughts I may have or things I have learned throughout my tenure as a software developer in the form of blog posts, tutorials, guides or any other format that may be required. I do this in an attempt to archive this knowledge for future references and also to help out any software engineers that may find my posts insightful.

I currently serve as a Software Engineer for Intrado in Mexico City and work on freelance projects when I have the time. I am also a humble BJJ white belt and enjoy playing video-games.
